prompts.title: Seamless Geometric Pattern Generator
prompts.description: Generates seamless geometric patterns for product packaging using Midjourney.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Seamless geometric pattern generator
OBJECTIVE: Create a unique, high-quality seamless geometric pattern for [COMPANY NAME] product packaging.
CONTEXT: The pattern must be suitable for various packaging materials and sizes. It should complement the brand's visual identity without overwhelming it.
INPUT FORMAT: Provide the following details:
- Brand color ([BRAND COLOR], e.g., #6C5CE7)
- Pattern style (e.g., geometric shapes, lines)
- Desired pattern complexity level (1-10 scale)
OUTPUT FORMAT: Deliver a high-resolution image file of the seamless geometric pattern in [FILE FORMAT]. The output must be ready for use without further modifications.
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure that the generated pattern is scalable and can be applied to different packaging sizes. Avoid using any copyrighted elements or logos.
STYLE: The design should be modern, clean, and professional. It should not contain any text or imagery other than geometric shapes and lines.
prompts.use_case: Businesses need a unique seamless geometric pattern for their product packaging that aligns with their brand identity.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in generating seamless geometric patterns for product packaging. Your task is to create high-quality, scalable designs based on the provided specifications.
example_user_messages: Generate a pattern using blue as the primary color and squares as the main shape.
Create a complex pattern with lines and circles that fits within a 10x10 grid size.
example_outputs: A high-resolution image file of a seamless geometric pattern in PNG format, primarily composed of blue square shapes.
A detailed design plan for a complex pattern using both lines and circles, sized to fit within a 10x10 inch grid.

packaging.description: Instantly generate seamless geometric patterns tailored for your product packaging with PatternPerfect. Perfect for brands looking to enhance their visual identity.

pricing_tiers.free: Basic pattern generation up to three times per month, no customer support included.
pricing_tiers.starter: $10/month -  Unlimited pattern generations with basic customer support during business hours.
pricing_tiers.pro: $25/month - Priority customer support, advanced customization options, and a dedicated account manager.
